markdownRemark.html:
This site and the content are built with Gatsby a React-based, GraphQL powered, static site generator. â€¦ It uses powerful preconfiguration to build a website that uses only static files for incredibly fast page loads, service workers, code splitting, server-side rendering, intelligent image loading, asset optimization, and data prefetching.

My Projects will be listed here as posts. In the mean time see my old portfolio at Old Portfolio Site

frontmatter.description: This portfolio showcases projects I have worked on. Built with Gatsby this sub site is served up with static files from a Google Cloud Platform storage bucket. Gatsby is a great starting place for learning React for new and seasoned developers alike and it is a blast to work with.
frontmatter.title: Static Site Portfolio
